name: The View From Here
desc: Upload landscape photos from your phone, which will drop GPS accurate pegs on a world map, allowing other users to see and save them to their profiles.

name: Smash.ME
desc: Create an esports profile and record your results to make a name for yourself on the esports scene.

name: Event-Finder
desc: Search for an event by location, genre, and date, then get info about everything from tickets to the best route.

name: Weather-Tracker
desc: Search, save, and recall weather information by location, including temp, wind, humidity, and UV index.
